features: THE MAGNET TILES: come with round edges, Smooth surface, high transparency, Easy to construct and easy to put away for storage. The perfect educational presents for school age children that will never go out of style.

MAGNETIC BUILDING TILES: Clear colors 3D Educational Entertainment great for Pre-Kindergarten Toy and all ages - Kids building toys Challenge your kids to build creative designs & social development with Educational STEM learning.

SET INCLUDES: 100 basic shapes Plus 13 Instructive inserts letter Plastic cards pop into each tile window, Compatible with other brands but better quality, comes with all major colors - Red Blue Green Yellow & Purple, strong magnets sealed within the plastic frame, Safe play toys for your kids.

LEARNING BY PLAYING: Never too early to start developing kids creativity. The magnetic building tiles help your kids learning about shapes, colors and color-match, construction, counting, engineering, teamwork. Endless possibility, inspire imagination, creativity,3D spatial thinking.
MAGNET TILES BUILDING SET - Kids Safe Material non-toxic, BPA free - has a safety certificate testing approval - Great Gift for Birthday and Holidays for Boys & Girls.
body.description: Building blocks for kids meets all safety requirements by Child safety. toy blocks is easy to construct and easy to put away for storage. - building toys for kids magnet comes with highest strength magnets to a great magnetic connection. - children's building blocks keep kids building and creating toy block for hours at a time - building blocks toys is the perfect STEM toy for developing children’s creative learning and motor skills- kids building sets includes different shapes - Magnetic Building Tiles Magees Building Set includes - 40 x Squares - 4 x big Squares - 16 x Window - 14 x triangles - 14 x Equilateral triangles - 12 x Long triangles - Extra 10 Piece Insert Letter Cards Bonus - Handes-on Fun That Turns On The Brain. - Great Gifts For Boys And Girls - Magees Is Designed In The USA. - Patent - Original - By Magees

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compatible with Magna Tiles
reviews.reviewText: We have a small set of Magna tiles and we’re looking for more tiles at a better price point. They are totallycompatible with Magna tiles. They attach with no problem the only slight difference is the taller triangle is about an eighth of an inch taller but they still stick to Magna tiles. The magnets on this set are actually stronger. The letter blocks snap into the window tile with no problem. Even our 3 year old granddaughtercan do it. She and her 5 1/2 year old sister love them. I highly recommend them as they are very durable. This set set is definitely worth the money and is something they won’t get tired of playing with for a long time. Really encourages imagination in building on STEM skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome building magnets
reviews.reviewText: My family loves, loves, loves these magnets! We can’t say enough good about them. They are very sturdy, they build cubes and castles alike. And my grand children ages 1 1/2 to 12 years old looks forward to pulling these out when they come to visit. They’re even fun for the adults as well. We have purchased several sets of these, and combined them over the years. A very good find at a very good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong magnetic building tiles
reviews.reviewText: My grandchildren, aged 2 and 4, loved these tiles. The strong magnets allowed them to build larger and taller towers that were sturdy. They immediately used the book provided to build new structures. And now their imagination is creating variations and combinations.Great purchase at a reasonable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent purchase I’m strongly thinking about buying another set!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excellent buy!!! All my kiddos are teens to adults (explains the video my girls testing out the blocks pre-party) but I bought these to have on hand for when little ones come to visit & for a party we were having, I didn’t want to invest too much but I still wanted them to be of good quality and after reading reviews on many different sets I decided on these ones and they were a definite great buy, honestly it kept all ages entertained from the little ones to even my adult kiddos! I had parents asking where I purchased because apparently the name brand set goes for $100+ Be mindful I’ve never felt the name brand so I don’t know what to compare them to but as far as magnet strength they were awesome, I will be a 100% honest as the plastic does feel a little lightweight but regardless I know they use pretty heavy duty magnets because my girls built some pretty large structures and they held up pretty well. These were such a hit and such a great price I’m strongly thinking about purchasing another set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We really like these manga tiles. The magnets are strong and my grandsons enjoy building with them very much. I’d buy them again.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are great and children love them
reviews.reviewText: They work with other brands of magnet tiles children love building with them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for all ages!!
reviews.reviewText: As a teacher in a K-6 school, all kids loved building with these! We bought some for our grandchildren and they are so excited to come to our house!!
These are super sturdy and well priced. My daughter has loved these for such a long time. She won’t be growing out of these anytime soon!
De buena calidad, son tantos que puedes jugar horas!

A little flimsy and not as strong as I had expected. Still works as illustrated and for its price perhaps this is the quality you get but overall wasn't impressed. Would make a good n reasonably priced gift for kids though.
Kids love this. Simple but allows for a lot of creativity. Very sturdy in design.

No son tan fuertes del imán como otros comentarios dicen, mi bebe de dos años los separa bien, y cuando haces un cubo u otra forma se cae, son los únicos que he probado, no tengo punto de comparación pero en general para jugar están geniales, si vienen rayados pero no creo que sean usados, mas bien es q el material se raya fácilmente con la manipulación
